description:
Birds of a feather...dance together??
Get a sneak peek of the #HOLOTORI members getting some practice in for "HOLOTORI Dance!" before the #hololivesummer2023 Splash Party concert!

▶Tickets
https://www.zan-live.com/en/live/detail/10292

▶HOLOTORI Dance! MV
https://youtu.be/BcO9bZavHRg

▶Digital Song Release
https://cover.lnk.to/HOLOTORIDance

Follow the #HOLOTORI members!

▶Takanashi Kiara
